description: Developed REST APIs using Java and Spring Boot for christmas offers.   The API handled 10K+ daily requests for the Christmas time window with p99 < 80ms.
Led AAA to CloudAuth migration of 8+ services within Amazons backend systems, in which I had to migrate services from legacy authentication system AAA to CloudAuth.

Bannered carousel implementation on pages: Revamped high-traffic horizontal carousel components using Amazon UI (AUI) framework, replacing compact cards with visually appealing banner like components.
Weblab cleanup: Reduced code complexity, risk of regression, and increased code maintainability by removing 750+ dead andredundant lines of code after cleaning up 3 weblabs code.
